 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַב‎</span> **verb** ==mount and ride, ride== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rakâbu***</u></abbr>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְכֵיב‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***id.***; compare Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רכב‎</span> ***war-chariot***, proper name, of divinity <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רכבאל‎</span> ([[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>108</sup>); Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רכבהו‎</span> = ***his rider*** [[BDB#Mordt|Mordtm]]<sup>Him. Inschr.25</sup> (of horse; but ***his trappings*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 306, 5</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***attain, acquire***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Esth.6.8|Esth 6:8]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַבְתָּ‎</span> [[Num.22.30|Num 22:30]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽכְבוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.30.17|1Sam 30:17]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְכַּב‎</span> [[Lev.15.9|Lev 15:9]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְכַב‎</span> [[Ps.45.5|Ps 45:5]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְכֹּב‎</span> [[2Sam.16.2|2Sam 16:2]]; [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֵב‎</span> absolute [[Num.22.22|Num 22:22]] +, construct [[Amos.2.15|Amos 2:15]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכְבוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.49.17|Gen 49:17]] +; feminine singular absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֶ֫בֶת‎</span> [[1Sam.25.30|1Sam 25:30]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכְבִים‎</span> [[Judg.10.4|Judg 10:4]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***mount, mount and sit***, or ***ride***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵל‎</span> of camel [[Gen.24.61|Gen 24:61]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.30.17|1Sam 30:17]], of ass (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמוֺר‎</span>) [[1Sam.25.42|1Sam 25:42]]; [[1Sam.25.20|1Sam 25:20]]; [[2Sam.16.2|2Sam 16:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> object omitted), [[2Sam.19.27|2Sam 19:27]]; [[1Kgs.13.13|1Kgs 13:13]], of mule (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶד‎</span>) [[2Sam.13.29|2Sam 13:29]] absolute of mounting (and riding in) chariot [[1Kgs.18.45|1Kgs 18:45]]; [[2Kgs.9.16|2Kgs 9:16]]. 

**2.** ***ride, be riding*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of mule (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶד‎</span>) [[2Sam.18.9|2Sam 18:9]], of ass, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתוֺן‎</span> [[Num.22.22|Num 22:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), so (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> object omitted) [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמוֺר‎</span> [[Zech.9.9|Zech 9:9]], of hose [[Zech.1.8|Zech 1:8]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאֶֿרְכָּב‎</span> (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>) [[Lev.15.9|Lev 15:9]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of animal (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֵמָה‎</span>) [[Neh.2.12|Neh 2:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of chariotry and horses [[Jer.17.25|Jer 17:25]] = [[Jer.22.4|Jer 22:4]] absolute (perhaps In chariot) [[Ps.45.5|Ps 45:5]] ***ride on ! ride*** (habitually) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתוֺן‎</span>[[Num.22.30|Num 22:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיָרִים‎</span> [[Judg.10.4|Judg 10:4]]; [[Judg.12.14|Judg 12:14]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span> [[Hos.14.4|Hos 14:4]] (figurative of alliance with Egypt), [[Jer.6.23|Jer 6:23]]; [[Jer.50.42|Jer 50:42]]; [[Esth.6.8|Esth 6:8]]; [[Hab.3.8|Hab 3:8]] (figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; possibly Add suffix reference to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָם‎</span>, compare [[Deut.33.26|Deut 33:26]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלקַֿל‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span>) [[Isa.30.16|Isa 30:16]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכְּֿרוּב‎</span> [[2Sam.22.11|2Sam 22:11]] = [[Ps.18.11|Ps 18:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעָֿב קַל‎</span> [[Isa.19.1|Isa 19:1]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַיִם‎</span> ***ride through*** [[Deut.33.26|Deut 33:26]], but also with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location ***in, through***, [[Ps.68.5|Ps 68:5]]; [[Ps.68.34|Ps 68:34]]. 

**3.** participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכֵב‎</span> etc., as substantive, ***rider:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכְבֵי אֲתֹנוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.5.10|Judg 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ה)סוּס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Amos.2.15|Amos 2:15]]; [[2Kgs.9.18|2Kgs 9:18]]; [[2Kgs.9.19|2Kgs 9:19]]; [[Ezek.23.23|Ezek 23:23]]; [[Ezek.38.15|Ezek 38:15]]; [[Zech.10.5|Zech 10:5]], so (appositive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָשִׁים‎</span>) [[Ezek.23.6|Ezek 23:6]]; [[Ezek.23.12|Ezek 23:12]] suffix of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span> [[Gen.49.17|Gen 49:17]]; [[Exod.15.1|Exod 15:1]]; [[Exod.15.21|Exod 15:21]]; [[Jer.51.21|Jer 51:21]]a [[Zech.12.4|Zech 12:4]]; [[Job.39.18|Job 39:18]]; [[Hag.2.22|Hag 2:22]]b; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.23|2Kgs 18:23]] = [[Isa.36.8|Isa 36:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹכְבֵי רֶכֶשׁ‎</span> [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]]; [[Esth.8.14|Esth 8:14]] suffix of chariot [[Jer.51.21|Jer 51:21]]b [[Hag.2.22|Hag 2:22]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְכַּבְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.66.12|Ps 66:12]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַדְכֵּב‎</span> [[Gen.41.43|Gen 41:43]]; [[2Kgs.13.16|2Kgs 13:16]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְכִּבֵהוּ‎</span> [[Deut.32.13|Deut 32:13]], etc.; ***imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְכֵּב‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.16|2Kgs 13:16]] — 

**1.** ***cause to (mount and) ride:*** with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמוֺר‎</span> [[Exod.4.20|Exod 4:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּרְדָּה‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.33|1Kgs 1:33]]; [[1Kgs.1.38|1Kgs 1:38]]; [[1Kgs.1.44|1Kgs 1:44]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סוּס‎</span> [[Esth.6.9|Esth 6:9]], cf. (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלסֿוּס‎</span> omitted) v[[Esth.6.11|Esth 6:11]] with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of chariot [[Gen.41.43|Gen 41:43]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.10.16|2Kgs 10:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of chariot omitted [[2Kgs.9.28|2Kgs 9:28]]; [[2Kgs.23.30|2Kgs 23:30]] = (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלרֶֿכֶב‎</span>) [[2Chr.35.24|2Chr 35:24]] figurative [[Job.30.22|Job 30:22]] (that is, on the wind); with accusative of thing + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלעֲֿגָלָה‎</span> [[2Sam.6.3|2Sam 6:3]] = [[1Chr.13.7|1Chr 13:7]] figurative, with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלבֿמותי ארץ‎</span>) [[Deut.32.13|Deut 32:13]] so [[Isa.58.14|Isa 58:14]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְראֹשֵׁנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.66.12|Ps 66:12]] ***over our heads***. 

**2.** ***cause to draw*** (plough, etc.) [[Hos.10.11|Hos 10:11]], object Ephraim Under figure of heifer. 

**3.** figurative (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿקֶּשֶׁת‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְכֵּב יָָֽדְךָ‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.16|2Kgs 13:16]] (twice in verse); ***cause hand to ride upon*** (grasp) ***bow***.
